name: mm_user
description: marketmind's web service for managing users

scripts.fastapi: echo Starting FastAPI services... && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n POSTDESC,IMGGEN,TIME,RECO -c "cyan.bold,magenta.bold,yellow.bold,green.bold" "npm run PostDescriptionModel" "npm run image_gen" "npm run PostingTimeModel" "npm run RecommendationModel" "npm run MarketTrendModel"
scripts.start: npm run reqinstall && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n API,BACKEND -c "blue.bold,red.bold" "npm run fastapi" "npm run node"
scripts.reqinstall: npm run install:PostDescriptionModel && npm run install:ImageModel && npm run install:PostingTimeModel && npm run install:RecommendationModel
scripts.install:PostDescriptionModel: cd model_api/PostDescriptionModel && py -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:ImageModel: cd model_api/ImageModel && py -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:PostingTimeModel: cd model_api/PostingTimeModel && py -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:RecommendationModel: cd model_api/RecommendationModel && py -m pip install -r requirements.txt
